```{r}
library(broom)
library(glue)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(tidyverse)
```

This is an [R Markdown](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com) Notebook. When you execute code within the notebook, the results appear beneath the code. 

Try executing this chunk by clicking the *Run* button within the chunk or by placing your cursor inside it and pressing *Cmd+Shift+Enter*. 


```{r}
df <- read_csv('histogram-only.txt')
df
```

```{r}
pp <- ggplot(df, aes(x = 1:nrow(df), y=Count/36902)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5, size = 1) +
  scale_colour_brewer(palette = 'Set1') +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = 'No Vehicles in the Park Opinions',
       subtitle = 'Percent of people who agree with each position',
       x = 'Opinion',
       y = 'Agreement percentage') +
  scale_y_log10(labels = scales::percent) +
  annotate("text", x = Inf, y = -Inf, label = "danluu.com",
      hjust=1.1, vjust=-0.2, cex=20,
      fontface = "bold", alpha = 0.03)
pp
```
```{r}
ggsave(file="park-agreement.png", plot=pp, width=10, height=8)
```



```{r}
ggplot(df) +
  stat_ecdf(eaes(x=Count, y = log10(1 - after_stat(y)))) +
  scale_y_continuous('1 - cdf (log scale)', breaks = seq(-4, 0), 
                     labels = 10^(seq(-4, 0)),
                     limits = c(-4, 0)) +  
  scale_colour_brewer(palette = 'Set1') +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = 'No Vehicles in the Park Opinions',
       x = 'Opinion',
       y = 'Count') +
  annotate("text", x = Inf, y = -Inf, label = "danluu.com",
      hjust=1.1, vjust=-0.2, cex=20,
      fontface = "bold", alpha = 0.03)
```



```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(Count)) +
  stat_ecdf(geom = 'step') +
  scale_colour_brewer(palette = 'Set1') +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = 'No Vehicles in the Park Opinions',
       x = 'Opinion',
       y = 'Count') +
  scale_y_log10() +
  annotate("text", x = Inf, y = -Inf, label = "danluu.com",
      hjust=1.1, vjust=-0.2, cex=20,
      fontface = "bold", alpha = 0.03)
```
